social-row.author-has-twitter: If you read this far, tweet to the author to show them you care.
social-row.default-tweet: Thank you {{ twitter }} for writing this helpful article

learn-to-code-cta.text: Learn to code for free. freeCodeCamp's open source curriculum has helped more than 40,000 people get jobs as developers.

footer.tax-exempt-status: freeCodeCamp is a donor-supported tax-exempt 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization (United States Federal Tax Identification Number: 82-0779546)
footer.mission-statement: Our mission: to help people learn to code for free. We accomplish this by creating thousands of videos, articles, and interactive coding lessons - all freely available to the public. We also have thousands of freeCodeCamp study groups around the world.
footer.donation-initiatives: Donations to freeCodeCamp go toward our education initiatives, and help pay for servers, services, and staff.
